settings.label: Enable styled tables
settings.info: This will add borders and padding to your tables

settings.label: New, pre-order, and coming soon banners
Enable solid header background color
settings.info: This will enable a solid header over the home page featured banner image

settings.label: Enable header background transparency
settings.info: This will make the header semi-transparent throughout the shop

settings.content: Before enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on collection thumbnails
Display star rating on product page

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in their default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.
To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to Test Mode.

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again
Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Enable parallax scrolling on banner images
